knimeNode.name: Model Creator
knimeNode.shortDescription: Enter primary and secondary model formulas

fullDescription.intro: Enter primary and / or secondary model formulas, either simply the formula(s) and parameters or also already estimated models (e.g. from the literature).
fullDescription.option: Define type of model: Primary, secondary or primary (secondary). The latter is a combination of one primary and one or more secondary models.
Do not change to enter a completely new formula. It is also possible to choose a formula from the database and to change it.
Enter a name for the new formula.
Enter the formula and click 'Apply'. Enter e.g. '2x' as '2*x', if '2' does not belong to the parameter name.

Define the independent parameter. If known, also enter value, standard error, minimum and maximum values for the parameter. If the option 'primary (secondary)' was chosen click on a parameter name in order to define the secondary model for this parameter.
If known from a previously estimated model (e.g. from the literature), enter values for R2, root mean square, Akaike information criterion or Bayesian information criterion.
Enter details about the experimental conditions leading to the data for which the entered model was estimated.

ports.outPort: Model formula(s) with parameters, goodness of fit and additional informations
